capabilities.description: Zerotier requires NET_ADMIN to configure the VPN interface, modify routes, etc.
capabilities.name: NET_ADMIN

capabilities.description: Zerotier requires NET_RAW to use raw sockets and proxying
capabilities.name: NET_RAW

capabilities.description: Zerotier is able to write to audit log.
capabilities.name: AUDIT_WRITE

capabilities.description: Zerotier is able to chown files.
capabilities.name: CHOWN

capabilities.description: Zerotier is able to bypass permission checks.
capabilities.name: DAC_OVERRIDE

capabilities.description: Zerotier is able bypass permission checks for it's sub-processes.
capabilities.name: FOWNER

capabilities.description: Zerotier is able to bind to privileged ports.
capabilities.name: NET_BIND_SERVICE

capabilities.description: Zerotier is able to set group ID for it's sub-processes.
capabilities.name: SETGID

capabilities.description: Zerotier is able to set user ID for it's sub-processes.
capabilities.name: SETUID

capabilities.description: Zerotier is able to set process capabilities.
capabilities.name: SETPCAP

capabilities.description: Zerotier is able to perform various system administration operations.
capabilities.name: SYS_ADMIN

run_as_context.description: Zerotier runs as a root user.

attrs.label: Auth Token
attrs.description:
(Optional) The auth token for Zerotier.</br>
Same as authtoken.secret.

attrs.label: Identity Public
attrs.description:
(Optional) The identity public for Zerotier.</br>
Same as identity.public.

attrs.label: Identity Secret
attrs.description:
(Optional) The identity secret for Zerotier.</br>
Same as identity.secret.

attrs.label: Networks
attrs.description: The networks for Zerotier.

attrs.label: Additional Environment Variables
attrs.description: Configure additional environment variables for Zerotier.

attrs.label: Host Network
attrs.description: Bind to the host network. It's recommended to keep this disabled.

attrs.label: Zerotier Config Storage
attrs.description: The path to store Zerotier Config.

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.
tmpfs: Is a temporary directory that will be created on the RAM.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)
tmpfs (Temporary directory created on the RAM)

attrs.label: tmpfs Configuration
attrs.description: The configuration for the tmpfs dataset.

attrs.label: Tmpfs Size Limit (in Mi)
attrs.description:
The maximum size (in Mi) of the temporary directory.</br>
For example: 500

attrs.label: ixVolume Configuration
attrs.description: The configuration for the ixVolume dataset.

attrs.label: Enable ACL
attrs.description: Enable ACL for the storage.

attrs.label: Dataset Name
attrs.description: The name of the dataset to use for storage.

attrs.label: Enable ACL
attrs.description: Enable ACL for the storage.

attrs.label: Host Path
attrs.description: The host path to use for storage.

attrs.label: Additional Storage
attrs.description: Additional storage for Zerotier.

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.</br>
SMB Share: Is a SMB share that is mounted to as a volume.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)
SMB/CIFS Share (Mounts a volume to a SMB share)

attrs.label: Read Only
attrs.description: Mount the volume as read only.

attrs.label: Mount Path
attrs.description: The path inside the container to mount the storage.

attrs.label: Enable ACL
attrs.description: Enable ACL for the storage.

attrs.label: Host Path
attrs.description: The host path to use for storage.

attrs.label: ixVolume Configuration
attrs.description: The configuration for the ixVolume dataset.

attrs.label: Enable ACL
attrs.description: Enable ACL for the storage.

attrs.label: Dataset Name
attrs.description: The name of the dataset to use for storage.

attrs.label: SMB Configuration
attrs.description: The configuration for the SMB dataset.

attrs.label: Server
attrs.description: The server to mount the SMB share.

attrs.label: Path
attrs.description: The path to mount the SMB share.

attrs.label: Username
attrs.description: The username to use for the SMB share.

attrs.label: Password
attrs.description: The password to use for the SMB share.

attrs.label: Domain
attrs.description: The domain to use for the SMB share.

attrs.label: Containers
attrs.description: Containers where the label should be applied

attrs.label: CPUs
attrs.description: CPUs limit for Zerotier.

attrs.label: Memory (in MB)
attrs.description: Memory limit for Zerotier.
